marker.ph:
<<ContentPage.Resources> <ResourceDictionary> <local:ObjToStr x:Key="ObjToStrConverter" /> </ResourceDictionary> </ContentPage.Resources> <ContentPage.BindingContext> <viewModels:MainPageViewModel /> </ContentPage.BindingContext> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Slider x:Name="AngleSlider" Margin="10" HeightRequest="50" Minimum="-360" Maximum="360" />
<views:SpinnerWheel Grid.Row="1" x:Name="SpinnerWheel" BackgroundColor="LightGray" WidthRequest="600" HeightRequest="600" RotationAngle="{Binding Source={x:Reference AngleSlider}, Path=Value}" Items="{Binding Letters}"/>
<StackLayout Grid.Row="2" Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalOptions="Center"> <Button x:Name="GoLeft" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" LEFT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoLeftCommand}" />
<Button x:Name="GoRight" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" RIGHT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoRightCommand}" /> </StackLayout>
<Label Grid.Row="3" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=SelectedItem, Converter={StaticResource ObjToStrConverter}}" /> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Slider x:Name="AngleSlider" Margin="10" HeightRequest="50" Minimum="-360" Maximum="360" /> <views:SpinnerWheel Grid.Row="1" x:Name="SpinnerWheel" BackgroundColor="LightGray" WidthRequest="600" HeightRequest="600" RotationAngle="{Binding Source={x:Reference AngleSlider}, Path=Value}" Items="{Binding Letters}"/> <StackLayout Grid.Row="2" Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalOptions="Center"> <Button x:Name="GoLeft" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" LEFT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoLeftCommand}" />
<Button x:Name="GoRight" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" RIGHT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoRightCommand}" /> </StackLayout> <Label Grid.Row="3" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=SelectedItem, Converter={StaticResource ObjToStrConverter}}" />.../>

<<Button x:Name="GoLeft" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" LEFT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoLeftCommand}" /> <Button x:Name="GoRight" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" RIGHT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoRightCommand}" />.../>

task.summary: First commit - also updated Xamarin Forms and added macOS project
Painted a few circles on a larger circle
Added a Slider to change the rotation angle of the canvas
Added touc hsupport for spinning the wheel
Fixed the computation of rotation angle and direction
The orientation of the little circles is now constant
Wheel can be rotated only by dragging on one of the little wheels
Wheel now snaps to closest slot
Pressed option is slightly scaled up to give a bit of visual feedback
Options are slightly transparent. The currently-pressed option is not transparent.
Moved the wheel such that only its left side can be seen
Added logic to highlight the currently-active Item and to expose the active Item via a Dependency Property
Simplified merged two data structures into just one

MESSAGE.value: First commit - also updated Xamarin Forms and added macOS project
Painted a few circles on a larger circle
Added a Slider to change the rotation angle of the canvas
Added touc hsupport for spinning the wheel
Fixed the computation of rotation angle and direction
The orientation of the little circles is now constant
Wheel can be rotated only by dragging on one of the little wheels
Wheel now snaps to closest slot
Pressed option is slightly scaled up to give a bit of visual feedback
Options are slightly transparent. The currently-pressed option is not transparent.
Moved the wheel such that only its left side can be seen
Added logic to highlight the currently-active Item and to expose the active Item via a Dependency Property
Simplified merged two data structures into just one

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Simplified merged two data structures into just one

<Button x:Name="GoRight" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" RIGHT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoRightCommand}" /> </StackLayout>
<Label Grid.Row="3" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=SelectedItem, Converter={StaticResource ObjToStrConverter}}" /> </Grid>.../>

<Button x:Name="GoRight" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text=" RIGHT " Command="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=GoRightCommand}" /> </StackLayout> <Label Grid.Row="3" HorizontalOptions="Center" Text="{Binding Source={x:Reference SpinnerWheel}, Path=SelectedItem, Converter={StaticResource ObjToStrConverter}}" />.../>
